description: Chuck, like his military academy classmate Kou, was stationed at the Torrington base after graduation. After the theft of the Gundam GP02A, he is likewise reassigned to the Albion as part of its mobile suit pilot team. Piloting a GM Cannon II, Chuck provides artillery support for the Albion`s other mobile suits, and in a similar fashion his happy-go-lucky personality provides a valuable counterbalance to the intense and moody Kou.
name: Chuck Keith
